title: Immune-Related Adverse Events for Endocrine Toxicities - Hypothyroidism
desc: The Immune-Related Adverse Events for Endocrine Toxicities - Hypothyroidism grades severity of hypothyroidism secondary to immune checkpoint inhibitor therapy.

orgreference.text: Brahmer JR, Lacchetti C, Schneider BJ, et al. Management of Immune-Related Adverse Events in Patients Treated With Immune Checkpoint Inhibitor Therapy: American Society of Clinical Oncology Clinical Practice Guideline. J Clin Oncol. 2018;36(17):1714-1768.

data.evidence:
Criteria

Hypothyroidism grade

TSH <10 mIU/L and asymptomatic

G1

Moderate symptoms; able to perform ADLs; TSH persistently >10 mIU/L

G2

Severe symptoms, medically significant or life-threatening consequences, unable to perform ADLs

G3-4

See Next Steps for details on management.
